sample_events.original: After reading the book, and reading all the news articles, we feel Mr. Albright may have been wrongly convicted of Shirley Williams’ murder, and that whoever killed her likely killed the other two as well. We cannot guess if he has ever killed others, but lean towards his innocence in these three that qualify him as a serial killer. He does not seem to be a nice man, but maybe not a serial killer either.

sample_events.original: Dale took a plea agreement in the Breeden family assault. He had already served 99 days in jail. He promised to several things: abide law, no violations of state and federal law, to answer questions truthfully, full time employment upon release, no possession/consumption of alcohol, no presence of drug and alcohol use, mental health evaluation 30 days later, go to counseling. He was given a 2-5 years suspended sentence in a halfway house, he had a curfew, and got his van back so he could do work.
sample_events.standardized: Dale took a plea agreement in the Breeden family assault. He had already served 99 days in jail. He promised to several things: abide law, no violations of state and federal law, to answer questions truthfully, full time employment upon release, no possession/consumption of alcohol, no presence of drug and alcohol use, mental health evaluation 30 days later, go to counseling. He was given a 2-5 years suspended sentence in a halfway house, he had a curfew, and got his van back so he could do work.

sample_events.original: On the evening of the sixth day, he gave her a roast beef dinner, dressed her up in socks and panties and drove her 70 miles away to Old Government Bridge. He then proceeded to stab her with a large knife 6 times in her vital organs, then dumped her body in the shallow waters over the bridge.

sample_events.original: Picks up 30 year old prostitute Wendy Meyers (1).  The two negotiate sex for money and have sex until Francois becomes angry, believing that Myers had ripped him off. He begins choking her until she dies when the hyoid bone in her neck cracks.  After the murder, he bathes her and stores the body in a black garbage bag in the attic.
sample_events.standardized: Picks up 30 year old prostitute Wendy Meyers (1).  The two negotiate sex for money and have sex until Francois becomes angry, believing that Myers had ripped him off. He begins choking her until she dies when the hyoid bone in her neck cracks.  After the murder, he bathes her and stores the body in a black garbage bag in the attic.

sample_events.original: Picks up 28 year old prostitute Gina Barone (2) and negotiates sex for money.  The two have sex in the garage of the Francois residence until Francois becomes angry, feeling that Barone had ripped him off.  He chokes her until her death and then moves the body to the attic of the house.

sample_events.original:
After dropping his mother off at work at the Hudson River Psychiatric Hospital, picks up prostitute Cathy Marsh (3).  He takes Marsh back home to his house after

After dropping his mother off at work at the Hudson River Psychiatric Hospital, picks up prostitute Cathy Marsh (3).  He takes Marsh back home to his house after

sample_events.original: While mother was hospitalized for trying to set the house on fire, Dale moved to Greeley, Colorado. Dale hated moving and the one person who was supportive in his life, his mother, was crazy. Father was abusive to him and his mother. Dale ran away often and enjoyed the outdoors rather than going to school. At this time He has his first Psychiatric evaluation. He was held back a year in school and flagged for having serious emotional problems. Got caught committing assault with a deadly weapon, stealing and turned over to Juvenile Authority’s and was sent to Lookout Mountain School for Boys.
sample_events.standardized: While mother was hospitalized for trying to set the house on fire, Dale moved to Greeley, Colorado. Dale hated moving and the one person who was supportive in his life, his mother, was crazy. Father was abusive to him and his mother. Dale ran away often and enjoyed the outdoors rather than going to school. At this time He has his first Psychiatric evaluation. He was held back a year in school and flagged for having serious emotional problems. Got caught committing assault with a deadly weapon, stealing and turned over to Juvenile Authority’s and was sent to Lookout Mountain School for Boys.

sample_events.original: Did well at the reform school, learning to weld with proficiency. He leaves the reformatory at age 19.
sample_events.standardized: Did well at the reform school, learning to weld with proficiency. He leaves the reformatory at age 19.

sample_events.original: Becomes involved with a 16-year old girl. The family likes her, but he was engaged. Gone during the weekdays and only home on the weekends. She ends up finding another man and leaving. Dale is devastated and things go bad and he has law trouble. He was stealing and sent to jail multiple times. He spent time in CO Buena Vista Correctional Facility.
sample_events.standardized: Becomes involved with a 16-year old girl. The family likes her, but he was engaged. Gone during the weekdays and only home on the weekends. She ends up finding another man and leaving. Dale is devastated and things go bad and he has law trouble. He was stealing and sent to jail multiple times. He spent time in CO Buena Vista Correctional Facility.

sample_events.original: Calmed down and became a productive member of society. Dale helped to build a church to which he was a member and attended. He also was a member of the Operating Engineer’s Union.
sample_events.standardized: Calmed down and became a productive member of society. Dale helped to build a church to which he was a member and attended. He also was a member of the Operating Engineer’s Union.

sample_events.original: Marries a woman named Melody (18) and on their wedding night she wants a divorce. They had many verbal arguments. He supported her but his job was volatile. She was violent hitting him and he never hit her back. During the relationship dale moves into a friends place after losing his job. During his stay, Dale almost chokes the friend’s daughter to death over pork being prepared differently.

During his stay, Dale almost chokes the friend’s daughter to death over pork being prepared differently.

sample_events.original: Dale and Melody get back together and break up several times, but they divorce for good in 1986. At this point Dale threatens to kill himself and has a psychiatric evaluation. He went to the police with his depression and was sent to a community hospital where he was diagnosed with depression and thought disorder.

He went to the police with his depression and was sent to a community hospital where he was diagnosed with depression and thought disorder.

sample_events.original: There were suspected related murders found in Wyoming. Only skeletal remains were found of a female age 25-30. Injuries were located in the upper arm, right rib cage, and left ankle. Her face was reconstructed statistically since it was destroyed by the elements.
sample_events.standardized: There were suspected related murders found in Wyoming. Only skeletal remains were found of a female age 25-30. Injuries were located in the upper arm, right rib cage, and left ankle. Her face was reconstructed statistically since it was destroyed by the elements.

sample_events.original: Janelle Johnson was found with legs protruding from a make shift grave. She had been buried, but storm runoff had eroded away part of the grave. She had been raped and bite marks were left on her shoulder.
sample_events.standardized: Janelle [PERSON] was found with legs protruding from a make shift grave. She had been buried, but storm runoff had eroded away part of the grave. She had been raped and bite marks were left on her shoulder.

sample_events.original: After his release from the hospital, he lived on his uncle’s property in Moneta, WY. The property was located in a large open terrain. Dale converted a 1950s bus into a living space. It had little more than propane stove and small bed and no real power. Spent his time doing part time jobs and scavenging. During this time he became good at hunting and using a knife. The lack of accommodations leads Dale to develop bad hygiene.
